title: Integrate GitHub pull request links directly into the Development Tasks card interface
description: As a project manager, I want to see GitHub pull request links and status indicators directly in the Development Tasks card interface so that I can seamlessly navigate between project management and code review workflows without switching contexts.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Development Tasks cards display associated GitHub PR links with clickable URLs
Real-time status indicators show PR state (open, merged, closed, draft) with color coding
Clicking PR links opens GitHub in new tab without disrupting current workflow
Tasks can display multiple PR links when feature spans multiple pull requests
Display PR metadata including author, creation date, and review status

tasks.description: Implement GitHub API integration for fetching PR data
Design and implement PR link display component in Development Tasks cards
Create real-time status indicator system with color coding
Implement PR metadata display (author, date, reviews)

warnings: Story may be too large - consider splitting into smaller increments
suggestions: Consider splitting into: 1) Basic PR link display, 2) Status indicators, 3) Metadata display
Define specific GitHub API rate limiting strategy
Specify error handling for GitHub API failures
